title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: Maps Under the Proposed Rule for Dog Management
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Dog Management Planning     Maps Under the Proposed Rule for Dog Management                Maps Under the Proposed Rule For Dog Management        These maps illustrate where people would be able to enjoy the park with their dogs - both on and off-leash - as well as places that would be dog free under the Proposed Rule for Dog Management in the GGNRA.  The Proposed Rule was open for a 90 day comment from February 24 to May 25, 2016. To read the Proposed Rule and review public comments, please visit www.regulations.gov (RIN 1024-AE16).   Click on the links at the bottom of this page to review each of the specific mapped areas.             Map 1- Overview Map Map 2- Stinson Beach Map 3- Muir Beach Map 4- Homestead Valley Map 5- Oakwood Alta Map 6- Rodeo Beach Map 7- Marin Headlands Map 8- Fort Baker Map 9- Fort Mason Map 10- Crissy Field Map 11- Fort Point Map 12- Baker Beach Map 13- Lands End & Fort Miley Map 14- Sutro Heights Park Map 15- Ocean Beach Map 16- Fort Funston Map 17- Mori Point Map 18- Milagra Ridge Map 19- Cattle Hill & Sweeney Ridge  Map 20- Rancho Corral De Tierra   Click here to view all maps (1-20) under the Proposed Rule.       Dog Management Planning Links  Visit www.regulations.gov (RIN 1024-AE16) to read and comment on the Proposed Rule for Dog Management in the GGNRA.  Technical Errata on "Special Regulations: Areas of the National Park Service, Golden Gate National Recreation Area, Dog Management" (Proposed Rule for Dog Management in the GGNRA)  Dog Management Planning Timeline  Public Meetings on the Proposed Rule for Dog Management in the GGNRA  Information about the the Proposed Dog Management Rule   Stay Informed  Sign up here to receive e-mail notifications about dog management planning, public meetings, and other general information.
